Security Policy
===============

Supported Versions
------------------
We aim to support the latest minor releases. Security fixes are backported on a
best-effort basis.

Reporting a Vulnerability
-------------------------
- Please email warden-core@proton.me with details and a PoC if possible.
- Do not open public issues for security problems.
- We will acknowledge receipt within 3 business days.

Disclosure Process
------------------
1. Triage and reproduce.
2. Assign CVSS score and scope.
3. Prepare fix and coordinate a release.
4. Credit reporters (optional) in release notes.

PGP/Encryption (Optional)
-------------------------
If you require encryption, request our PGP key in your initial email.
